abilities.description: (PASSIVE)ROCK SURFINGTaliyah gains Move Speed near walls.
abilities.name: ROCK SURFINGT

abilities.description: (Q)THREADED VOLLEYTaliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.
abilities.name: THREADED VOLLEYT

abilities.description: (W)SEISMIC SHOVETaliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.
abilities.name: SEISMIC SHOVET

abilities.description: (E)UNRAVELED EARTHTaliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.
abilities.name: UNRAVELED EARTHT

abilities.description: (R)WEAVER'S WALLTaliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
abilities.name: WEAVER
